QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.id odf_pk, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.parent_lookup as parent_lookup, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.code as code, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.child_lookup as child_lookup, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, (select created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) created where created.user_id = odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.created_by) as created_by, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.mapping_type as mapping_type, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, ( SELECT P.PAGE_CODE FROM CMN_PAGES P WHERE P.ID in ( SELECT DECODE( CMN_PAGES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE, 'SYSTEM', CMN_PAGES.ID, NVL( CMN_PAGES.ORIGINATING_PAGE_ID, CMN_PAGES.ID ) ) FROM CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES, CMN_PAGES WHERE CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.PAGE_FRAME_ID = CMN_PAGES.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID = ODF_CA_COP_IDEA_PRJ_MAP.ID AND CMN_INSTANCE_PAGES.OBJECT_TYPE = 'cop_idea_prj_map' ) ) as page_layout, (select created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) created where created.user_id = odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.last_updated_by) as updated_by, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.name as name, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.partition_code as partition_code, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map odf_ca_cop_idea_prj_map where 1 = 1
